column1: #Text=FIFA U-17 World Cup : Ghana vs. Germany
#Text=Erb , Rausch , Dowidat & Sauerbier ( Yellow ( 4 ) ) , Rausch ( Yellow-Red ( 1 ) )
#Text=Germany have qualified for a place in the Round of 16 at the 2007 FIFA U-17 World Cup by defeating Ghana 3-2 in their 2nd Group F match at the Cheonan Sports Complex today .
#Text=The Germans put the Africans under pressure from the first whistle and were rewarded for their positive attitude by a 5th minute goal from Sascha Bigalke .

#Text=The outstanding playmaker Bayern Munich 's Toni Kroos increased Germany 's lead in the 12th minute when his free-kick from 20 yards out 1st hit the post before bouncing in off Ghana keeper Joseph Addo .
#Text=Kroos made it 3-0 for Germany in the 27th minute after a through ball from Bigalke .
#Text=Ransford Osei and Sadick Adams got a goal a piece in the 52nd minute and 53rd minute respectively to make it 3-2..
#Text=Germany 's Konstantin Rausch was shown a red card in the 2nd half , but they held on for the win .
#Text=" We were magnificent in the first half .
